name: Sniper 3D Kill Shot
description:
Fueled by the next generation technology Sniper 3D Kill Shot combines unparalleled cinematic presentation with dynamic gameplay to create an unprecedented Sniping experience.Give your best shot Game.Best sniping game available in market. Bring forth your perfect aiming and shooting skills. Will provide you an opportunity to prove your sniping skills. In Game, you need to shoot down the high risk targets. These high risk targets are very dangerous for the society. As a professional sniper, show your rapid response to complete the task and make your society clean from these criminals. Use your lethal sniping skills against these criminals and bring peace to your society, like a true guardian of the society.

Is consists of multiple sniping missions. IYou need to clear your assigned mission to get access to next one. Use your clear aiming and sniping skills to accomplish the assigned tasks in time.

Game Features:
1.Sniper 3D Kill Shot is loaded with 25 gaming levels
2.Best Sniping environment & graphics
3.Best Sniping controls
4.Gun Selection
5.Interesting sniping missions and game story

How to Play:
Mission description is given at the beginning of each mission use this description carefully to identify the high risk target and eliminate it. Use your Sniper Scope to get the clear view of your red target, aim it perfectly and snipe him down with clear shoot. Avoid killing local people because it will result in mission failure.If you forget to update your weapon, don't worry you can update it in game play by clicking "update your weapon" message.
